syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Chemistry 9701

learning_objectives.description: describe and understand the terms (a) stationary phase, for example aluminium oxide (on a solid support) (b) mobile phase; a polar or non-polar solvent (c) Rf value (d) solvent front and baseline
explain the differences in Rf values in terms of interaction with the stationary phase and of relative solubility in the mobile phase
